subject: What Is My Blood
text:
I have to say this, 
I can hear in a silence, 
I love my whole daydream. 
For in my movement, 
My speech, 
My looks, somehow 
I have inside me, 
Something that was before 
I can tell. 
I sense something strong 
Of what I will be, 
And all that's around me, 
Is in fact going around 
And flowing. 
And some part of this, 
Is in someone else.
